mapper.sql: a.id, a.proc_ins_id, u.id AS "user.id", u.name AS "user.name", o.id AS "office.id", o.name AS "office.name", a.start_time, a.end_time, a.overtime_type, a.days, a.reason, a.status, a.anno, a.notes, a.pr_text, a.leader_text, a.hr_text, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.remarks, a.del_flag
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=a.user_id JOIN sys_office o ON o.id=a.office_id
mapper.select: SELECT so.id,so.name FROM sys_office so left join sys_user su on so.id=su.office_id WHERE su.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM over_time a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and a.status="审核通过" ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO over_time( id, user_id, office_id, start_time, end_time, overtime_type, reason, status, anno, notes, days, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{office.id}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{overtimeType}, #{reason}, #{status}, #{anno}, #{notes}, #{days}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE over_time SET user_id = #{user.id}, office_id = #{office.id}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, overtime_type = #{overtimeType}, status = #{status}, notes = #{notes}, reason = #{reason}, days = #{days}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE over_time SET status="销毁", del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id_ FROM act_ru_task ar WHERE proc_inst_id_=#{pid}

SELECT
FROM over_time a
WHERE year(start_time)=#{0} AND month(start_time)=#{1} AND status='审核通过'

SELECT u.name AS userName, o.name AS officeName, SUM(a.days) AS days FROM over_time a JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=a.user_id JOIN sys_office o ON o.id=a.office_id WHERE year(start_time)=#{0} AND month(start_time)=#{1} AND status='审核通过' GROUP BY u.name ORDER BY days desc
